abstract: Carl C. Icahn is considering taking another run at Delphi, now that a bankruptcy court judge has allowed for other bidders for the auto-parts supplier, The New York Post reported.
snippet: Carl C. Icahn is considering taking another run at Delphi, now that a bankruptcy court judge has allowed for other bidders for the auto-parts supplier, The New York Post reported.
lead_paragraph: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn is considering taking another run at Delphi, now that a federal bankruptcy court judge has allowed other bidders for the auto parts supplier, The New York Post reported, citing an unidentified source with direct knowledge of the matter.

headline.main: Icahn Could Bid for Delphi Again, Report Says
